summary: 1966  was a common year starting on Saturday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: The Mindbenders  were a 1960s beat group from Manchester, England. The band were one of the UK acts that were successful in the mid-1960s British Invasion of the US charts, with their chart-toppers "Game of Love"  in 1965 and "A Groovy Kind of Love" in 1966.
title: The Mindbenders
